overview: In an oral only movie devoted to she-males, Joey Silvera continues his obsession with she-males, extending the theme from lines like Rogue Adventures. With 4 well hung black-she males (Nefertiti, Aimee Lee, Mistress Mina, and Hottie Cox), a pair of Brazilian she-males (Andreia and Adriana), and 3 white she-males, there is a little something for every fan of this popular niche.
title: How to Please a She-Male
